Material used.Description: Immunofluorescence staining was performed on patient-derived brain tissue.

Readout description.Result Description: The intensity of MAPT staining was reduced in neurons with the NM_003581.3:c.1174G>A variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Control tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Secondary antibody only staining was performed as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Studentâ€™s t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: MAPT staining intensity between 80% and 120% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: MAPT staining intensity below 80% of control
